TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegistrationServices extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices

summary.span: 提供一组用于注册和注销托管程序集以供从 COM 使用的服务。

span.span: Provides a set of services for registering and unregistering managed assemblies for use from COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当程序集内的对象正在使用的 COM 客户端时，需要注册。Registration is needed when the objects within an assembly are being used by COM clients. [Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)和[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]使用公开的方法类来添加或移除的托管程序集的 COM 启用注册表项。The [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) and [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] use methods exposed by the class to add or remove COM-enabling registry entries for managed assemblies. 可以使用以下方法以帮助你准备注册文件：You can use the following methods to assist you in preparing a registration file: - - - - 虽然这些方法中收集的信息帮助要在注册文件中使用，但它们无法实际生成的注册文件。Although these methods help in gathering information to be used in a registration file, they do not actually produce a registration file. 相反，你可以使用[Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)工具`/regfile`选项以执行此任务。Instead, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) tool with the `/regfile` option to perform this task. 方法不能导出并注册类型库。 methods cannot export and register a type library. 若要导出并注册类型库时，可以使用[Regasm.exe （程序集注册工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)工具和[Tlbexp.exe （类型库导出程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)工具。To export and register a type library, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) tool and the [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) tool.

summary.span: 注册托管程序集中的类以便能从 COM 创建。

span.span: Registers the classes in a managed assembly to enable creation from COM.

span.span: if contains types that were successfully registered; otherwise if the assembly contains no eligible types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RegisterAssembly` 在指定的程序集添加相应的注册表项的类型。`RegisterAssembly` adds the appropriate registry entries for the types in the specified assembly. 此方法还会调用程序集中找到的任何注册函数。This method also calls any registration functions found in the assembly. 使用来获取程序集。Use to get an assembly.

summary.span: 向 COM 注册指定的类型。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，使用平台调用来调用非托管`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支持注册和注销的 COM 对象的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void RegisterTypeForComClients (Type type, ref Guid g);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterTypeForComClients(class System.Type type, valuetype System.Guid& g) cil managed
public: virtual void RegisterTypeForComClients(Type ^ type, Guid % g);

param.name: type
param.span: 要注册以供从 COM 使用的 。

span.span: The to be registered for use from COM.
The used to register the specified type.

summary.span: 使用指定的 GUID 向 COM 注册指定的类型。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于调用`CoRegisterClassObject`COM 中This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不是原子的并可能导致不可预知的结果时在多线程的上下文中使用。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在版本 2.0 及更高版本中，使用方法来注销 COM 中的类型In version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 请注意，使用平台调用来调用非托管`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支持注册和注销的 COM 对象的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter cannot be created.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int RegisterTypeForComClients (Type type, System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext classContext, System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationConnectionType flags);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 RegisterTypeForComClients(class System.Type type, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext classContext, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationConnectionType flags) cil managed

public: virtual int RegisterTypeForComClients(Type ^ type, System::Runtime::InteropServices::RegistrationClassContext classContext, System::Runtime::InteropServices::RegistrationConnectionType flags);

param.name: type
param.span: 要进行注册以供从 COM 使用的 对象。

span.span: The object to register for use from COM.

param.name: classContext
param.span: 值之一，指示将在其中运行可执行代码的上下文。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the context in which the executable code will be run.

param.name: flags
param.span: 值之一，指定如何建立到类对象的连接。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how connections are made to the class object.

summary.span: 使用指定的执行上下文和连接类型向 COM 注册指定的类型。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified execution context and connection type.

returns.span: 表示一个 Cookie 值的整数。

span.span: An integer that represents a cookie value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于调用`CoRegisterClassObject`COM 中This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不是原子的并可能导致不可预知的结果时在多线程的上下文中使用。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在.NET Framework 2.0 及更高版本中，使用方法来注销 COM 中的类型In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 请注意，使用平台调用来调用非托管`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支持注册和注销的 COM 对象的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter cannot be created.

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

summary.span: 注销托管程序集中的类。

span.span: Unregisters the classes in a managed assembly.

returns.span: 如果 包含成功注销的类型，则为 ；否则，如果程序集不包含符合条件的类型。则为 。

span.span: if contains types that were successfully unregistered; otherwise if the assembly contains no eligible types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnregisterAssembly` 删除中通过以前添加的指定程序集的类型的注册表项。`UnregisterAssembly` removes the registry entries for the types in the specified assembly previously added by . 此方法还会调用程序集中找到的任何注销函数。This method also calls any unregistration functions found in the assembly.
